content: The TE7 Max Ultrasound System is a general purpose diagnostic device designed for the ultrasound imaging, measurement, display and analysis of the human body and fluid. The system is equipped with advanced features to enhance patient outcomes and streamline workflow. The TE7 Max comprises a LED monitor with high-resolution display, a touch-enabled interface, a large storage basket, a sealed interface for fluid resistance and ease of disinfection, elevated transducer mounting, dedicated disinfectant holder, and a retractable cord to reduce tripping hazards and contamination. The system comes with an extensive suite of specialty transducers and AI-powered software applications, including cardiac imaging and fluid management tools designed for critical care environments. The TE7 Max also features needle enhancement technologies such as eSpacial Navi 4D magnetic needle navigation and iNeedle+ visualization technology to improve accuracy with needle-guided procedures. The TE7 Max offers a suite of AI tools for rapid assessment and measurement, including Smart B-Line, Smart FHR, Auto EF, Smart VTI, Smart IVC, and Smart Bladder. The system supports various modes of operation, including B, M, PWD, CWD, Color Doppler, Amplitude Doppler, Combined mode, Tissue Harmonic Imaging, Contrast imaging, TDI, Color M, Smart 3D, and iScape View.
